issue.message: It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 31
This folder configuration (`v24`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 24. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
